doc:
Kim Fields https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kim_Fields 0 Kim Victoria Fields (born May 12, 1969) is an American actress and television director. Fields is known for her roles as Dorothy "Tootie" Ramsey on the NBC sitcom The Facts of Life (1979–88), and as Regine Hunter on the Fox sitcom Living Single (1993–98). Fields is the daughter of actress/director Chip Fields and older sister of actress Alexis Fields. Kim_Victoria_Fields ( born May_12_,_1969 ) is an_American_actress_and_television_director . Fields is_known for her_roles as Dorothy_"_Tootie_"_Ramsey on the_NBC_sitcom The_Facts of Life (_1979 – 88_) , and as Regine_Hunter on the_Fox_sitcom Living Single_(_1993 – 98 ) . Fields is the_daughter of actress/director_Chip_Fields and older_sister of actress_Alexis_Fields .
